author: rhuijben
msg: Move the check that blocks deleting file externals to the client api.
For the working copy a file external is just another switched path and
we do allow deleting normal switched paths via svn_wc_delete4(). This also
makes it possible to delete these files via svn rm --force.
(svn_wc_delete4): Remove check on file externals. Also remove obsolete
(Doesn't apply to entries retrieved via svn_wc__get_entry()).

author: julianfoad
msg: Write "the 'current' file" instead of "the current file" for clarity in error
messages and comments when referring to the FSFS file named 'db/current'.

author: stsp
msg: More work on issue #2543 "Inconsistent svn diff after rename".
Overloading the meaning of --notice-ancestry was not a good idea.
Instead, add a new option called --show-copies-as-adds (option name
suggested by danielsh), and pass the new flag through libsvn_client
and libsvn_wc APIs. This also changes the default behaviour of svn diff
back to what it was before r39680: svn diff now compares copies to their
The new option works for the WC->WC case only for now, so re-adjust
some tests which were already expecting other cases to work.
(diff_wc_wc): New show_copies_as_adds parameter, pass it on to svn_wc_diff6().
(diff_repos_wc): Revert ancestry-heeding changes made in r39720, so that
this function resolves peg revisions by default again.
Pass show_copies_as_adds=FALSE to svn_wc_get_diff_editor6() for now.
(edit_baton): Add show_copies_as_adds member, tweak doc string of
(make_edit_baton): New parameter show_copies_as_adds, store its value in
(file_diff): Treat copies as schedule-normal files if eb->show_copies_as_adds
is FALSE. Don't use the eb->ignore_ancestry for this purpose.
(main): Set opt_state.show_copies_as_adds depending on the new option.
Add tests for cases which should work eventually but don't work yet,
this test passes with the expected test output as modified in r39680.

author: rhuijben
msg: Don't use entries when fetching working copy properties. The property
code just needs the node type, so retrieve just that from wc_db.
(svn_wc_merge_props3): Check for existance and hidden via wc_db. And
retrieve the node kind when performing loggy execution.
(svn_wc__merge_props): Remove adm_abspath argument and just retrieve the
node type instead. Only run the log when there is something in the log.
(svn_wc__internal_propget): Just look at the node type instead of using
obsolete node behavior. We will never see these missing states once we

author: rhuijben
msg: Add helper function for running logfiles without passing an access baton.
We can retrieve the access baton when running the log.
